name: succulent garden
description:
Rustic wooden box filled with a textural planting of succulents.  May include echevaria, jade, aloe and others... selections will vary due to availibility.  

Delivery available locally in Brooklyn.  This item is NOT available for shipping. Additional Delivery charges may apply.

bright light/direct sun. 
water when dry.  

TIP! pick your plants up! if it feels light, it needs water.  water until they feel heavy NOT just until the water runs out of the bottom... this is how you know the soil is absorbing the water and your plant is getting the drink it needs. 

 box dimensions: 12"x4"x4"

name: lavender.
description:
the calming scent of lavender...this dried bundle of the stuff is just what you need! 

this product can be shipped or hand delivered locally in Brooklyn if paired with another item.

name: potted orchids
description:
phaeleonopsis orchids potted in natural wooden boxes, finished with moss and dressed with seasonal branches make the perfect gift or accent for your home. 

easy care!  filtered light, not direct sun.  water when dry, approximately 1x/week.  remember to feed them! you like to eat, so do your plants!

color selection to vary, call for current availibility. (white/purple/yellow)
delivery in Brooklyn only.

name: handmade Quade bouQuet.
description:
part floral bouQuet/part sculpture.  these bouQuet's are handcrafted using textural fresh blooms in a chosen color palette, here we are featuring spider mum, craspedia, seeded eaucalyptus and others in a green and yellow palette.  kerry Quade hand felts pods that are nestled amongst the blooms to complement the color palette and bring a sculptural feeling to the bouQuet.  

selections/color palette to change seasonally & depend upon availibility.  

delivery available locally in Brooklyn, additional charges may apply. please call for details and to place order.

name: Beauty Box 101.
description:
give or get the perfect gift for the budding florist in your life!  ( yes, i said it... )

we call our tool kit a "Beauty Box" as it goes everywhere with the Quade team as they make the world a prettier place.  this kit includes all of our faves to get you started along with a suggested list of additional items that may be helpful to ninja your way through any floral emergency!

all items packed into a handy little tote for easy storage and travel.

Included in your very own Beauty Box:
clipper
wire cutters
corsage tape
pins
scissors ( to be used for ribbon ONLY! we actually tie a piece of ribbon on our handle as a reminder )
straight wire
spool wire
florist knife
oasis tape

this item is available for delivery locally in Brooklyn and will arrive gift wrapped or can be shipped.

name: enJOY! bouQuet.
description:
need a host(ess) gift?  want the holiday scent but no room for a tree? 

this bouQuet of fresh cut evergreens arranged in a natural birch pot is just the thing you need!  accents of pinecones and cinnamon sticks complete this long lasting selection that will get you through the season. evergreen selections may include/but not limited to: magnolia,douglas fir, western cedar, insence cedar, & pine.  

just add water!  & remember to keep out of direct sun/away from heat sources.

available for delivery in Brooklyn & beyond... this sweet bouQuet will travel ok and can be shipped out of state.

name: Quade's holiday faves
description:
turkey leftovers may be delicious but watching orange blooms wither isn't so fun...this selection of Quade's faves is part cornucopia/part winter wonderland! 

fresh cut evergreens arranged in a natural birch pot paired with artichokes, brussels sprouts, & asparagus put a modern spin on a traditional harvest bouquet! accents of pinecones,cinnamon sticks, tulip bulbs and my favortite green cymbidium orchid blooms complete this long lasting selection that will get you through the season. 

evergreen selections may include/but not limited to: magnolia,douglas fir, western cedar, insence cedar, & pine.  

just add water!  & remember to keep out of direct sun/away from heat sources.

available for delivery locally in Brooklyn, additional charges may apply. please call for details and to place order.

this item is NOT available for shipping out of state.

name: ring around the wreath!
description:
our mixed green wreaths will welcome you with that winter balsam/fir scent at your door!

Winter Blues: (wreath shown)  adorned with pinecones, cinnamon sticks, thistle, & seeded eucalyptus.  

Homespun Classic: adorned with pink pepperberries, pinecones, cinnamon sticks and lavender. this is a classic kerry Quade wreath that has been a favorite of customers for many years...

wreath sizes are overall measurement NOT inside/ring size. larger sizes available, call for pricing.

INFO! cut evergreens will last throughout the winter if outside and not in direct sunlight as mother nature acts like a giant refrigerator. 

delivery available locally in Brooklyn, additional charges may apply.

this item can be shipped if ordered before December 5, 2013. additional charges apply.

name: pop! ring
description:
this fun Quirky felted ring will make you smile! 

other fun colors available... red,orange,magenta and well, white.  each one is unique and handmade by me :) 
the ball is approximately 1/2" in diameter,the ring band is an adjustable nickel free antique brass band with a size range from 6 - 8.5
